chapter.12.quest.5.description.1:
以下内容摘自wiki。一个常见的“罪行”是，玩家掠夺了不是由他们放置的箱子。如果有一个村民看到你在世界的任何地方犯下了这种“罪行”，你的声望都会降低。这不是仅仅适用于村庄内的箱子。

提高声望所需的最大绑定货币数量是8。但这种情况几乎不可能发生，除非你洗劫了村庄。大多数时候，1-2个绑定货币就足够了。

但是，如果你觉得你的声望被误判了，想从0声望开始，可以打开作弊模式并输入

 /setreputation reputation:villager @p 0

注意：你也需要贸易卷轴和足够的声望与村民交易。贸易卷轴可在不同的村民任务中获得。

chapter.2.quest.27.description.1: 滑翔伞可以帮助你快速穿越崎岖的地形——寻觅一处高点然后一跃而下。使用滑翔伞会消耗你的精力条，注意别耗尽全部精力，否则你会从半空坠落下来。如果你的目前精力较少，尽量选择贴地飞行。
chapter.2.quest.28.description.1: 试炼通过证或精华是提高精力上限的唯一途径。它们可以在神庙（大型的黄色或蓝色建筑，内含待解开的谜题）或一些任务中获得。精华可以从一些自然生成的怪物（如食人魔和教会仆人）身上掉落，也可以从一些任务中获得。获得后，请右键该物品以食用。一旦你拥有4个试炼通过证或者6个精华，请在村庄中向对应的神像祈祷，进行交易来增长你的血量与精力上限。

chapter.2.quest.29.description.1: 当你探索时，你会在某些村庄中找到指路石。你可以右键点击这些指路石（或者先破坏并重新放置来设置新的名称）来记录它们的位置。通过消耗经验值，你可以在指路石之间传送，但是制作一个传送石可以让你在任何地方无限制地（有冷却时间）传送到你保存的任何位置。
chapter.2.quest.3.description.1: 将“一袋子绿宝石”捐赠给任何村庄的公会会长可以恢复声望。制作“一袋子绿宝石”需要8颗绿宝石和1张皮革。要进行捐赠，只需找到公会会长（身穿蓝色衣服的村民，住在红色顶棚的小屋里），然后右键点击他柜台上的捐赠箱，放入“一袋子绿宝石”即可。玩家睡觉后捐赠才会生效。并且可能需要多次捐赠才能完全恢复声望。声望会因为在村民面前搜刮箱子或桶、伤害村民而降低。如果你的声望很低，就无法从村民那里接受任务或进行交易，也无法提交已完成的任务。
chapter.2.quest.3.title: 声望积分（以及该如何重置它）
chapter.2.quest.30.description.1: 除了可以在世界上找到，指路石也可以制作。你可以用它来为你的基地添加传送位置。这样，在长途旅行中携带另一枚指路石可以让你从家中快速往返，只需要将其放置、传送回家、进行补给/修理，然后再次传送回来并带走指路石。
chapter.2.quest.31.description.1:
初入世界，你势单力薄。但没关系——百围之木，始于勾萌。你的第一要务是寻找前期装备以武装自己。坦然面对旅途中那些与死亡的不期而遇，耐心地探索、挖矿、制作。按部就班，终有一天你将踏上征服之路，击败那些望而生畏的boss。

死亡后，你将保留大部分物品。但你也会掉落一些物品（如矿石、某些材料或货币），它们将被存放在玩家的尸体中，这个尸体将在7分钟后消失。死亡也会损坏你的工具和装备，并给你一个减益效果，在一段时间内增加装备损坏和经验损失。在短时间内反复死亡可能会严重损坏你的装备，并导致经验损失增加。

chapter.2.quest.32.description.1: 下一步是寻找具有更好属性的装备。你可以通过搜刮宝箱、打怪和完成某些任务来获取装备。这些装备的战斗力更强，但一旦耐久度耗尽就无法修复。所以在你有多余装备之前，节约使用。

chapter.2.quest.34.description.1: 在战斗中取得胜利的重要因素之一是饮食。怪物的攻击迅猛，仅凭你薄弱的生命值恐怕很难抗住。饱和度高的食物可以确保你的生命值回复持续更长时间，这微弱的区别有时足以决定你的生死。尽管造价高昂，黄金食物对生命回复大有裨益。此外，你的饮食多样性会给你带来增益效果，这同样有助于你的生存。请查阅“烹饪和农业”任务页以获取食物选择。食物清单（可制作，任务奖励）将显示你当前和可能的食物增益。

chapter.2.quest.35.description.1: 战斗技能可以大大提高你的生存能力。通过公会会长的第一个任务可以获得“翻滚”技能，而其他战斗技能可以通过村庄守卫颁布的任务学习。寻找村庄以获得这些有用的技能。 “翻滚”的绑定键可以在按键绑定中设置和编辑。你可以右键单击以学习技能，并通过“技能编辑”菜单（可配置）来装备它。

chapter.3.quest.3.description.1: 云存储可能需要一些时间来获取所需材料，然而它提供了一个非常灵活的存储系统。想要一个大型存储网络？小一些的？大型的、独立的网络？云存储可以做到这一切--只是要确保你没有恐高症！

chapter.3.quest.4.description.1: 要开始云存储，你需要先收集气球碎片和云块。气球怪物和云类怪物会在Y=196以上的高空生成，建议你在高山附近寻找它们！在空中搭建起一个平台，战斗时会更加游刃有余，使用弓箭效果更佳。气球怪物掉落的碎片可以和线一起做成气球。而云类怪物掉落的云块可以用来制作云箱。
chapter.3.quest.5.description.1: 设置云存储的最后一步是在一处连通天空（上方没有方块遮挡）的位置放置一个云箱，然后手持一只气球右键云箱来进行绑定，所有绑定了相同颜色气球的云箱库存是同步的。用同样的方法放飞普通箱子，所有相同颜色气球的箱子将连接到同一个存储网络（由对应的云箱管理）。
chapter.3.quest.6.description.1: 静电气球和静电云箱可用于创建一个供所有玩家使用的云储存。这对希望共享库存的小队来说非常实用。在雷暴天气，击败吐气云可以掉落静电云块。将静电云块放置在地面上，然后用气球右击即可给气球充电。静电云箱则可由静电云块直接合成。

chapter.4.quest.1.description.1: 初学者法术书标志着你魔法之旅的开始。它可以用一些基本物品轻松合成。破旧的笔记本（可制作）包含了有关新生魔艺模组的详细信息，但这条任务线可以为你提供一些参考，以及一些必要的物品和功能。魔法是极其强大的，为了尽可能保持整合包的平衡，一些法术已被禁用。
chapter.4.quest.10.description.1: Generates source by consuming potions from adjacent potion jars. The amount of source varies per potion and is dependent on the complexity of the potion. Bonus source is given for the length and level of the potion with multipliers for each effect a potion contains.
chapter.4.quest.11.description.1: Generates source when nearby animals breed or die. Provides passive growth boost to baby animals nearby.
chapter.4.quest.12.description.1: Generates a moderate amount of source from nearby food, generating more for more nourishing food. Source Berry food is worth far more than other mundane foods. Additionally, the Mycelial Sourcelink will convert Grass or Dirt in the 3x3 below it into Mycelium and will grow mushrooms around it given that the space is empty. The Sourcelink will also pull items from nearby pedestals.
chapter.4.quest.13.description.1:
Drygmys are often found following and tending to animals around it. They can be found anywhere, though somewhat rarely. Drygmys can be given a home in the world, and will produce items from nearby monsters and animals as if they were slain, without harming them. A wild drygmy may be befriended by throwing a Wilden Horn near it (this creates a Drygmy Shard)! You may dye a Drygmy Cyan, Orange, or Brown.


Right-click a block of Mossy Cobblestone with a Drygmy Charm to summon it. The Mossy Cobblestone will turn into a drygmy altar. Source can be directed to the altar to power nearby Drygmys. Drygmys will automatically collect items and exp shards from nearby monsters and animals, and place them in a nearby chest. This is a great source for geenrating passive experience and items in place of a traditional mob farm. Items can be harvested through a one-block distance, allowing for different mobs to be fenced-in or encased completely.
chapter.4.quest.14.description.1:
Starbuncles naturally appear in wooded areas in search of golden nuggets. While Starbuncles are normally afraid of humans, they will allow someone to approach if they are holding a gold nugget. When a Starbuncle has picked up a golden nugget, it will vanish from this world and leave behind Starbuncle Shards.


&b&lSummoning
To summon a Starbuncle, use a Starbuncle charm on the ground. Summoned Starbuncles will pickup nearby items and can move items between inventories such as chests. Starbuncles will harvest Fully Grown Source Berry bushes around it. A Starbuncle will drop its charm when Dispelled or when killed. You may dye them using purple, red, yellow, orange, blue, or green dye.


&b&lItem Transport
To bind a Starbuncle to place items into a chest, use the dominion wand on the Starbuncle and then the inventory. To take items from an inventory, use the wand on the inventory and then the Starbuncle. Starbuncles will move items between as many inventories as you desire. Looking at a Starbuncle will tell you how many chests are being taken from, and input to. Using the Dominion Wand on a Starbuncle while sneaking will reset them.


&b&lFiltering
You may dictate where items go and may be picked up by using Item Scrolls or Item Frames. A Starbuncle may be given an Item Scroll: Allow or Deny, and will only pickup and move items respecting that filter. Alternatively, you may place an Item Frame on the inventory a Starbuncle is interacting with. You may either place an Item Scroll or a single item directly on the frame. Starbuncle interacting with that inventory will respect item framed filters.


&b&lPathing
Using a block on a Starbuncle will set them to prefer that block for pathing between areas, as long as it is on the way. They will also naturally prefer grass paths.


&b&lResting
Starbuncles may be bound to a Magebloom Bed using the Dominion Wand and will rest on the bed when there are no other tasks to be done. Useful for keeping them Out of the Way, or returning them to a spot where items drop.
chapter.4.quest.15.description.1:
Used to summon a Bookwyrm by right-clicking it on a lectern. Bookwyrms have no passive abilities, and only exist to be bound to the player as a familiar using the ritual of binding, which binds any nearby summoned mobs to the player as a familiar companion.  To begin summoning familiars, you will need to obtain a Bound Script of the entity you wish to befriend. These can be obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a relevant entity. Once you have obtained a Bound Script, use it to learn the familiar. Once you have obtained a bound script, you may access your list of familiars from your Spellbook crafting menu in the Familiars section. Selecting a Familiar will summon it in the world and give you Familiar Sickness, preventing you from summoning another one for a short time. To obtain your first familiar, perform the Ritual of Binding near a Starbuncle. Familiars are bound to the player.
When bound to the player, summoned mobs provide the following effects:
&b&lBookwyrm
A Bookwyrm will reduce the cost of all spells cast, and increases any spell damage by 1. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Bookwyrm.
&b&lWixie
Wixies will increase the duration of potions that you apply, and wixies will accept basic potion reagents in exchange for applying the tier 1 potion result. Additionally, the Wixie will apply harmful potions to enemies during combat. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Wixie.
&b&lDrygmy
A Drygmy familiar will increase the damage of Earth spells by 2, and has a chance to increase the amount of looting when slaying enemies. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Drygmy.
&b&lStarbuncle
A Starbuncle familiar that will grant you Speed 2. Additionally, using a Golden Nugget on the starbuncle will consume it and grant the owner a short duration of Scrying for Gold Ore. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Starbuncle.
&b&lWhirlisprig
Whirlisprigs will reduce the cost of Elemental Earth glyphs by half, and grants bonus saturation when consuming food. Obtained by performing the Ritual of Binding near a Whirlisprig.
chapter.4.quest.16.description.1:
A Wixie can automatically craft items for you at the expense of source. To obtain a Wixie Shard, cast Dispel on a Witch while it is half health or less. Once you have obtained a Wixie Charm, use it on a Cauldron to summon your Wixie. A Wixie can be dyed Red, White, Black, Blue, or Green.


&l&bItem Crafting
The Wixie will select the recipe for crafting based on the inventories nearby, you need not specify the exact materials for the recipe. For example, if you want to craft Sticks, the Wixie will mix and match planks from nearby chests in order to fulfill the recipe. Each craft requires a small amount of source and will be drained from nearby Source Jars. A redstone signal on The Cauldron will stop crafting.


&l&bMulti-Item Crafting
Wixies can craft multiple items at once by placing pedestals adjacent to The Cauldron. Wixie's will attempt to craft items in the pedestal, rotating round robin. Powering the pedestal will disable the wixie from crafting its item.


&l&bPotion Crafting
Wixies will autocraft potions using nearby Potion Jars and items. Potions that require Water will be supplied by the Wixie. Potions that require another potion as a base will be taken from nearby Potion Jars. A Wixie will output 3 doses of a Potion into a nearby Potion Jar when complete. To begin, place down an empty Potion Jar, right click The Cauldron with an Awkward Potion, and supply Nether Wart from a nearby chest.
chapter.4.quest.17.description.1:
Whirlisprigs are curious nature sprites that are exclusively found in forested areas. Summoned Whirlisprigs can be given a home in the world, and will begin producing natural materials including wood, crops, seeds, and flowers that exist around them. Wild Whirlisprigs can be befriended and will drop Whirlisprig Shards if a tree is grown near them.  To summon a Whirlisprig, use a Whirlisprig charm on any flower. Whirlisprigs consider their home to be 10 blocks in any direction from the flower. Whirlisprigs require source nearby to operate, and will only generate items if there is a chest placed next to the flower. You can get your charm back by using Dispel on a Whirlisprig. They may be given orange, yellow, white, or green dye.


&b&lHappiness
Summoned Whirlisprigs must be happy in order to produce materials, and their mood is determined by the number and diversity of natural materials in their home. You may use blocks on the Whirlisprig to gain additional info if a Whirlisprig would enjoy that block in their home. Interacting with the Whirlisprig with an empty hand will give you additional info on the Whirlisprig's happiness.


&b&lProduction
Drop rates are determined by happiness, diversity, and the proportions of blocks in a Whirlisprig home. For example, to generate a lot of logs, grow more trees. To gain more seeds and crop harvests, plant more crops.
chapter.4.quest.18.description.1:
Amethyst Golems will harvest, grow, and collect Amethyst near its home. To obtain an Amethyst Golem, perform the Ritual of Awakening near Budding Amethyst to obtain the Amethyst Golem Charm.


&b&lSummoning
Summon the Amethyst Golem by using a charm on a block. Before an Amethyst Golem will perform tasks, they must first have a home. Set their home by using the Dominion Wand on the golem, and then on a block. The golem's home is considered to be 10 blocks in any direction from the set position.


&b&lFarming Amethyst
Once a home has been set, the golem will begin performing tasks over time. They will convert Amethyst Blocks into Budding Amethyst, harvest Amethyst Clusters, speed up Budding Amethyst growth, and pick up and store Amethyst Shards.


&b&lStoring Amethyst
If a golem's home has been set to an inventory, golems will pick up and store Amethyst Shards in their bounded inventory block. If their home is not an inventory, they will simply ignore items on the ground.

chapter.4.quest.41.description.1: Wands accept only a single spell, and are inscribed using the Scribes Table. Can be used with a Comparator.

Cauldrons can hold various types of liquid, which can be poured into it directly. Some crafting recipes may also change the liquid stored into a diffent kind, which may be needed for other recipes. Additional materials needed for a crafting recipe can be tossed into the cauldron, or added via the the menu accessed by right-clicking the cauldron. chapter.5.quest.31.description.1:
Crows can be tamed by feeding them Seed Mixture. Once tamed, they can be controlled using a Crow Flute.


Sneak-Right click a crow familair to access its menu. From here, you can change its follow mode, behavior, and equip various decorative items.


&b&lFollow Mode
By setting a follow mode, you can change how the crow follows the player. It can follow/perch on the player's shoulder, wander or sit. Set the crow to "Help" mode to enable its gathering functions.


&b&lGathering
Crows in gather mode will collect nearby items and place them in a nearby coffer. The items types you wish to gether must already be present in the coffer. Crows must be set to perch on a coffer in order to deposit items (see "Crow Flute" section).


&b&lHarvesting
Crows in harvest mode will harvest nearby crops. This includes naturally generated crops and some plants (such as Hexerei plants found in swamp biomes). Can be combined with gathering crows to fully automate your farm. Best used with the crow flue (see below).


&b&lCrow Flute
Sneak+right-click while holding the crow flute to access the flute menu. This menu is similar to the crow menu, but can be used to select and command multiple crows, as well as set home points for individual or groups of crows. Choosing the "Seclect" option will allow you to right-click crows with the flute to select or de-select them. Switching to "Perch" mode will allow you to set a perch location for all currently selected crows. Changing any of the follow/help settings will change those settings for all selected crows at once. Great for directing larger numbers of crows at once, and the only way to set crow perch locations. Right-click with the flute to activate the selected function.


&b&lThieving
Crows in theiving mode will steal from nearby villagers, and drop the stolen items at their perch location. Set them to perch on a hopper for easy chest depositing. Steals a variety of items, including emeralds. Crows will fly around after thieving before depositing to evade detection.


&b&lBreeding
Multiple tamed crows can be given gold nuggets to breed.

chapter.6.title: 探索
chapter.7.quest.1.description.1:
破晓之界中的附魔是与原版截然不同的。在游戏的前期，您得具备LV2的附魔知识，才可以使用附魔台。通过完成公会会长的主线任务来获得附魔知识。（具体而言，完成打败九尾的任务）


附魔台新增了三个影响最终附魔品质的数值，它们是位阶、量子化以及阿卡那。同时附魔时魔咒线索也可以被一些方块影响。下方将会详细阐述这些数值。


&b&l位阶
代表着您的附魔台有多强大，增加经验消耗。只有将合适的书架放在附魔台一格远且至高两格的地方，才能影响附魔台的位阶。附魔等级最多能达到100级，远高于原版的30级，这将会让你获得比平时更稀有也更高等级的附魔。


&b&l量子化
影响附魔过程中的力量和变化幅度的可能性。更高的量子化或许可以获得高级别的附魔，但是如果你今天不太走运，你也有可能获得低级别的附魔甚至诅咒。一些方块能够为您的附魔台提供校准，这将降低量子化可能为附魔带来的负面影响，甚至让量子化完全为您的附魔带来正面收益。一定量的量子化永远是会带来好处的，即便您的附魔台目前没有校准值。


&b&l阿卡那
增加可能获得的附魔词条数量以及词条的稀有度。

chapter.7.quest.10.description.1: 一种不太常见的书架，减少附魔位阶，同时增加100%的量子化。
chapter.7.quest.11.description.1: 一种不太常见的书架。略微减少附魔位阶，但能让最终附魔等级波动随机范围减小。
chapter.7.quest.12.description.1:
解决附魔师门储存麻烦，居家出行必备的物品。能够同时储存大量附魔书。还能自动整合不同词条的附魔书，同时附魔书可以以任何形式被轻松取出。
能够为您省下铁砧组合附魔书词条时花费的大量经验。
chapter.7.quest.13.description.1: 在附魔台上显示进一步多的附魔信息。
chapter.7.quest.14.description.1: 最好的附魔书储存和组合问题的唯一解决方案。
chapter.7.quest.15.description.1: 一种升级版本的海洋书架。您需要一定等级，且在拥有对应附魔属性的附魔台上对其进行附魔，通过点击上方的物品图标或在JEI上搜索来获取更多关于海洋书架的信息。
chapter.7.quest.16.description.1: 一种升级版本的下界书架。您需要一定等级，且在拥有对应附魔属性的附魔台上对其进行附魔，通过点击上方的物品图标或在JEI上搜索来获取更多关于下界书架的信息。
chapter.7.quest.17.description.1: 更混沌，高级的附魔可能性。
chapter.7.quest.18.description.1: 一种升级后的灌注下界书架。提供更高的附魔属性
chapter.7.quest.19.description.1: 一种升级版本的灌注海洋书架，提供更高的附魔属性。
chapter.7.quest.2.description.1: 最基础的附魔物品。最多可以提供15位阶，最大附魔等级为30级。不提供量子化和阿卡那增益。最高位阶所需的书架数量比原版要少，因此可以与其他物品组合以获得更多的量子化和阿卡那，直到可以使用更高等级的书架。
chapter.7.quest.20.description.1: 更混沌，高级的附魔可能性。
chapter.7.quest.21.description.1: 显著提高附魔位阶，但不提供其他任何附魔属性。将其与其他书架组合搭建以在早期达到满级附魔位阶。
chapter.7.quest.22.description.1: 改进末地书架使其提供更好的附魔属性。
chapter.7.quest.23.description.1: 将降准这项附魔属性提供到你的附魔台中。降准将降低因量子化诅咒物品和提供更低级附魔的可能性。最高等级降准将使量子化属性只能提供纯粹的收益附魔属性（只会获得更好的附魔）。将鼠标悬停在附魔界面时可以查看校准等级。
chapter.7.quest.26.description.1: 你可以制作诸如“矿工宝典”、“头盔宝典”等各式各样的宝典。搜索JEI可以查阅所有可制作的宝典及他们的合成表。宝典可以像普通书籍一样附魔，但他们只会获得与宝典相对应的附魔熟悉，如头盔宝典只能获得与头盔相关的附魔属性。

chapter.7.quest.26.title: 宝典
chapter.7.quest.27.description.1: 在铁砧上使用。能够通过消耗一件物品来转移它的附魔属性。这是将一件物品上的附魔转移到其他物品上的一个好办法，但你永远不会清楚地知道你具体会获得什么......
chapter.7.quest.28.description.1: 对被诅咒的物品在铁砧上使用。您可以通过铁砧来解除物品的诅咒。这会消耗您一定经验。
chapter.7.quest.3.description.1: 能被放置于附魔台一格以外，至高两个高的地方以提供少量阿卡那。您可以在一格方块内放置多个蜡烛，但这并不会提供额外的阿卡那。
chapter.7.quest.4.description.1: 能被放置于附魔台一格以外，至高两个高的地方以提供少量量子化。将其巧妙与书架以及蜡烛组合搭建能为您在前期提供更好的各类附魔。
chapter.7.quest.5.description.1: 相较于骷髅头颅提供大量的量子化，但想要获取它是非常困难的。
chapter.7.quest.6.description.1: 一个提供更多量子化和阿卡那的高级书架。增加附魔位阶上限。能够与海洋书架组合搭建以拥有更平衡的附魔。
chapter.7.quest.7.description.1:
一个提供更多量子化和阿卡那的高级书架。
增加附魔位阶上限。
能够与下界书架组合搭建使用以拥有更加平衡的附魔。
chapter.7.quest.8.description.1: 最高级的书架。增加了位阶上限，提供均衡的神化附魔属性。
chapter.7.quest.9.description.1: 在附魔台上显示更多的附魔结果。
chapter.7.title: 附魔
chapter.8.quest.1.description.1: 在破晓之界的装备可以通过重铸它的品质以及镶嵌宝石来升级。这条任务线将提供回收装备材料、重铸装备以及镶嵌/移除宝石的功能方块的信息，例如重铸台。

chapter.8.quest.1.title: 重铸与镶嵌
chapter.8.quest.13.description.1: 利用锻造台将装备中的宝石提取出来的过程，将使装备被破坏。
chapter.8.quest.14.description.1: 利用锻造台移除装备上宝石的过程，将使宝石被破坏。
chapter.8.quest.2.description.1: 用于将宝石镶嵌到装备中。装备必须要有空的插槽来放置宝石。
chapter.8.quest.3.description.1: 使用从回收台获得的珍贵材料以及击碎宝石获得的宝石粉末以重铸装备。重铸可以重置一件装备的属性，同时不改变装备的稀有度。或者可以改变一件装备的稀有度，甚至这个装备在这之前根本没有稀有度。
chapter.8.quest.4.description.1: 用于从装备上回收重铸材料。材料类型的稀有度与装备的稀有度相适应，同时回收提供的材料数量是随机的。
chapter.8.quest.5.description.1: 您可以通过锻造台增加物品的额外插槽至最多三个，同时也能通过制作、宝藏或者以极低概率在任务中获得。
chapter.8.quest.6.description.1: 您可以通过灌注来获得一个升级镶嵌符文，该符文能够添加物品的插槽至最多四个。请查阅“附魔”任务页以获取更多信息。
chapter.8.quest.7.description.1: 通过粉碎宝石来获得。为了粉碎宝石，您需要将一个（或多个）宝石丢在地上。然后，在至少一格高的地方放置一个铁砧，破坏它下方的方块使其坠落，铁砧下落的冲击力将使宝石被击碎成粉末。您可以一次击碎多个宝石。铁砧的每一次坠落都会对铁砧造成轻量的损害。
chapter.8.title: 重铸与镶嵌
chapter.9.quest.1.description.1: 大多数情况，酿造与原版Minecraft并无差异，你可以通过JEI查看更多可供制作的药水。除此之外，玩家能够通过制作药水护符来获取比平时更长持续时间的药水效果，你甚至可以通过对药水护符附魔灌注来得到永久的药水效果。
chapter.9.quest.1.title: 药水酿造
chapter.9.quest.2.description.1:
玩家可以将不同药水与烈焰粉组合在一起来制作药水护符。手持时单击右键可以打开或关闭它，只要它在玩家的背包或护符槽中处于激活状态，就会为玩家提供相应的药水效果。您可以对这些护符附魔耐久或经验修补以延长它们的持续时间。


&b&l不毁护符
玩家可以使用附魔台对护符附魔灌注以使它们无法被破坏。不毁护符将永久提供对应药水的效果，同时也可以手动开启或关闭。对护符进行灌注需要附魔台拥有最高的位阶、处于8.5%到13.5%的量子化以及处于85%到95%的阿卡那。请查阅“附魔”任务页以获取更多有关灌注的信息。
